Reviews.Title: good choice
Reviews.Author: bonita
Reviews.Content: Nice and neat and slim it takes up very little room. It tells you who is calling without looking at the phone,

Reviews.Title: cost effective and excellent sound quality
Reviews.Author: Waiting 4EVO4G "Cool Gadget Luver"
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone because it's so easy to use.  Best part is the sound quality and battery life. Samsung did a nice job to make sure sound quality  is on par with their high end phones. I don't have to charge this phone everyday. Can go few days without charging if I don't talk too long on it. I also like the prepaid service without a contract. There are no additional charges and Cricket network has excellent coverage. Cricket prepaid cards can be purchased at any major retailers and online stores. Buy this phone if you want an affordable good quality phone with a reliable service from Cricket.  I had this phone over few months and have nothing really bad to say.

Reviews.Title: Great phone. Not so with Cricket
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This phone was everything I needed. Great phone. However, Cricket was terrible. I could never get voice mail to work after trying one hundred times. I turned the phone off and put it in the closet. Waste of time and money.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: z
Reviews.Content: This is a cheap phone, literally.... the T9 feature is hard to use and can be very frustrating.. the pictures are teeny tiny at best... pay a little more and get a better phone...

Reviews.Title: GO TO WALMART FOR THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: MD
Reviews.Content: YOU WILL SAVE AROUND 40%IF YOU GO TO WALMART IT IS NOT WORTH THE MONEY I GOT A PAY GO 2 YEARS AGO AND FINALLY I BROKE IT THE USB IS VERY TIGHT AND THE PLUG IS A SLIDE DOOR DON'T LIKE THAT CANT PUT YOUR NAME ON INSIDE SCREEN THE BATTERY COVER ITS LIKE ONE OF THE CHEEP ONES BUY A COVER FOR IT SO IT WILL LAST VERY FLIMSY I RECOMMEND FOR THE PRICE GO TO WALMART AND BY IT THERE, DOOO NOT BUY IT FROM A CRICKET DEALER BUY THE $35.00 PAYGO CARD TO AND CRICKET WILL THROW IN N EXTRA $5.00 THEN WHEN COMES TIME GO BACK TO STORE OR USE YOUR BANK CARD DIAL *729 BUT DO NOT GO TO A CRICKET DEALER FOR THE SAME PLAN I'VE SEEN IT $42.00 AND I'VE SEEN IT FOR $48.00 TWO PEOPLE I KNOW OK GOOD LUCK!

Reviews.Title: No customer service
Reviews.Author: ONLINE SHOPPER
Reviews.Content: Activation was hassle, to date still have msg on phone"dial *288 to activate"..even tho' able to call out/receive calls. Unable to get help from cust. serv. no live person to speak with. Impossible to contact anyone affiliated with Cricket Samsung Chrono cell phone service

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Cheri
Reviews.Content: The phone is OK. I was hoping that a phone that took pictures could also receive and send them. But I still get the "you are receiving Mixed Media messages ...." that I used to get. Oh, well...

Reviews.Title: Samsung no-contract phone, good buy
Reviews.Author: D. Fitzpatrick
Reviews.Content: If you use Cricket's Pay-Go service and need to replace a lost/broken phone, this is a very suitable option. I picked this one up hoping it would allow me to continue using my current service without needing to change my phone number, and, thanks to a friendly rep over the toll-free line, it did just that.I only dock a star for the phone's overall quirkiness and awkward design. The menus are easy to thumb through while sitting idle but, because of the extremely smooth and flat profile of the buttons, it can be frustrating trying to send a text or navigating menus while doing just about anything else. Also, you have to open the phone in order to see anything on the outside screen.I have no other gripes with this phone... it is built solid and feels very durable, has a sliding USB hatch rather than the ol' rubber flap, holds a charge for at least a few days at a time and above all, is a convenient, cost-effective way to keep in touch. A good buy.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: SJOz
Reviews.Content: The phone worked five the first day, but after that when I put it to charge the front screen went blank!! What the hell is that all about??!!

Reviews.Title: The Best Phone Ever Get it now.
Reviews.Author: Christopher "David"
Reviews.Content: This Samsung R261 Chrono Prepaid Phone (Cricket)  phone is hot it work great and any one who has it would love it. My mom has it and she love this phone. She said it work better then any ohter phone out there. Get it it a great phone to talk on and text with and around wonderful.
